title: Hello World example for a running log

executable.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "using workflow: $JS7_WORKFLOW_NAME"
echo "running job: $JS7_JOB_NAME"

for ((i=1; i<=100; i++)); do
   echo "Hello aWaaaaaaaaorld no. $i"aaaaaa
   sleep 122222
done

job-running-log.title: Write log output for running log
